Design-01.Description: These hood spear accent stripes are solid. Pre cut to fit around the vents depending on your trim level.

Design-02.Description: These hood spear accent stripes are solid with a thin pinstripe (red in image) around the outer edge. The pinstripe can be cutout or an alternate color. Pre cut to fit around the vents depending on your trim level.

Design-03.Description: The hood spear accents are perfect for your car! These are a solid stripe with a lower pinstripe (red in image) outlining the front section of the stripe. The pinstripes can either be cut out or a secondary color. Pre cut to fit around the vents depending on your trim level.

Design-04.Description: These strobe hood spear accent stripes will fit perfectly around the vents on your hood. This is a one color design. Pre cut to fit around the vents depending on your trim level.

Design-05.Description: This center hood decal is a chevroned strobe one color design.

Design-06.Description: This center hood stripe is a full strobe one color design. The "strobe" stripes vary from thick at the front to thin at the rear.
